reviews.review_msg: Patrick is the best professor you will get in your finance concentration. Having worked in industry, I know this is EXACTLY what you want to learn. Patrick follows the markets and makes this apart of his lectures. At the same time, you will learn the ins and out of a company that are vital aspects of securing a position (internship or full time).

For an upper division course, this is the type of professor you will want. Although he is not exactly the most organized professor, his passion and ability to bring the context of the course to the real world is incredibly valuable.  The paper is a strong capstone to the course, spend time on it and listen in lecture and you'll do fine.
